title: rads error + lol deleted
body: so i got a rads error, and i thought like tel me just re√Ønstall league and ill be fine, but when i deleted every lol file from my pc and tryed to download it again, i couldnt and it would say like "rads error" or something. pls help someone. im desperate.

replies.body:
RADS errors can be caused by a number of different issues, however, the most common is a permissions problem. Our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) goes over a lot of the common solutions and would be my recommended next step to solving this.

Let me know if this helped with your issue.
